00064 
00065 bool IsInsideMask(Point p, Mask::Pointer mask)
00066 {
00067     Mask::IndexType index;
00068     index[0] = std::floor(p.x() + 0.5);
00069     index[1] = std::floor(p.y() + 0.5);
00070     index[2] = std::floor(p.z() + 0.5);
00071 
00072     MaskRegion region = mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00073 
00074     bool isIn = false;
00075 
00076     if(index[0] >= 0 && index[0] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(0) &&
00077        index[1] >= 0 && index[1] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(1) &&
00078        index[2] >= 0 && index[2] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(2))
00079         isIn = (mask->GetPixel(index) > 0) ? true : false;
00080 
00081     return isIn;
00082 }
00083 
00084 Direction MeanDirection(SHModel *modelFun, Point currentPoint, Direction lastDirection, Real angleThreshold)
00085 {
00086     std::vector<Direction> maxima = modelFun->getMaxDirectionsAt(currentPoint);
00087 
00088     if(maxima.size() > 1)
00089     {
00090         Vector lastVector = lastDirection.toVector();
00091         std::vector<Direction> mus;
00092         std::vector<Real> values;
00093 
00094         // we keep only maxima in the solid angle
00095         for(std::vector<Direction>::iterator it=maxima.begin(); it!=maxima.end(); it++)
00096         {
00097             Vector v = it->toVector();
00098 
00099             Real scalProd = v.x()*lastVector.x() + v.y()*lastVector.y() + v.z()*lastVector.z();
00100             Real normU    = v.x()*v.x() + v.y()*v.y() + v.z()*v.z();
00101             Real normV    = lastVector.x()*lastVector.x() + lastVector.y()*lastVector.y() + lastVector.z()*lastVector.z();
00102             Real alpha    = std::acos( scalProd / std::sqrt(normU * normV) );
00103 
00104             if(alpha <= angleThreshold)
00105             {
00106                 mus.push_back(*it);
00107                 values.push_back(modelFun->odfAt(*it, currentPoint));
00108             }
00109         } // for each maxima
00110 
00111         if(mus.size() > 1)
00112         {
00113             // Find maximal direction
00114             Direction maxDir;
00115             Real maxValue = 0;
00116 
00117             for(unsigned int i=0; i<mus.size(); i++)
00118             {
00119                 Real tmp = values[i];
00120 
00121                 if(maxValue < tmp)
00122                 {
00123                     maxValue = tmp;
00124                     maxDir   = mus[i];
00125                 }
00126             }
00127 
00128             return maxDir;
00129         }
00130         else if(mus.size() == 1)
00131             return mus.front();
00132         else // mus.size() == 0
00133         {
00134             Direction nullDir;
00135             nullDir.setNull();
00136 
00137             return nullDir;
00138         }
00139     }
00140     else if(maxima.size() == 1)
00141         return maxima.front();
00142     else // maxima.size() == 0
00143     {
00144         Direction nullDir;
00145         nullDir.setNull();
00146 
00147         return nullDir;
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 Real ComputeGFA(SHModel *model, Signal* signal, Point p)
00152 {
00153     Matrix S = signal->signalAt(p);
00154     Matrix M = model->signalAt(p);
00155 
00156     Real psi_average = 0;
00157     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00158         psi_average += S(i,0);
00159     psi_average /= S.Rows();
00160 
00161     Real psi_std = 0;
00162     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00163         psi_std += (S(i,0)-psi_average) * (S(i,0)-psi_average);
00164     psi_std /= S.Rows();
00165     psi_std = std::sqrt(psi_std);
00166 
00167     Real psi_rms = 0;
00168     for(unsigned int i=0; i<S.Rows(); i++)
00169         psi_rms += S(i,0) * S(i,0);
00170     psi_rms /= S.Rows();
00171     psi_rms = std::sqrt(psi_rms);
00172 
00173     Real GFA = psi_std / psi_rms;
00174 
00175     return GFA;
00176 }

00178 
00179 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00180 {
00181     // Command line variables
00182     std::string dwiFileName;
00183     std::string vecFileName;
00184     std::string maskFileName;
00185     std::string labelFilename;
00186     std::vector<int> select_labels;
00187 
00188     std::string outFibersFileName;
00189 
00190     bool verboseMode;
00191     bool quietMode;
00192     bool saveTmpFiles;
00193     bool lps;
00194 
00195     unsigned int modelOrder;
00196     Real lambda;
00197     Real stepSize;
00198     Real angleThreshold;
00199     Float seedSpacing;
00200 
00201     std::string inRadix;
00202 
00203 
00204     try
00205     {
00206         //
00207         // Program's command line parser definition
00208         //
00209 
00210             // Defines command line parser
00211             TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("BTK Tractography", ' ', "0.2");
00212 
00213             // Defines arguments
00214             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>   dwiArg("d", "dwi", "Dwi sequence", true, "", "string", cmd);
00215             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>  maskArg("m", "mask", "White matter mask", true, "", "string", cmd);
00216             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> labelArg("l", "label", "Label volume of seeds", true, "", "string", cmd);
00217             TCLAP::MultiArg<int>        labelsArg("", "labels", "Label select for processing", false, "int", cmd);
00218 
00219             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outFibersArg("", "fibers", "Output fibers filename (default \"fibers-label\")", false, "fibers", "string", cmd);
00220 
00221             TCLAP::SwitchArg verboseSwitchArg("", "verbose", "Display more informations on standard output", cmd, false);
00222             TCLAP::SwitchArg quietSwitchArg("", "quiet", "Display no information on either standard and error outputs", cmd, false);
00223             TCLAP::SwitchArg saveTmpSwitchArg("", "save_temporary_files", "Save diffusion signal, model coefficients, variance and spherical coordinates of gradient directions in files", cmd, false);
00224             TCLAP::SwitchArg lpsSwitchArg("", "lps", "Word coordinates expressed in LPS (Left-Posterior-Superior). By default RAS (Right-Anterior-Superior) is used.", cmd, false);
00225 
00226             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> orderArg("", "model_order", "Order of the model (i.e. of spherical harmonics) (default 4)", false, 4, "unsigned int", cmd);
00227             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    lambdArg("", "model_regularization", "Regularization coefficient of the model (default 0.006)", false, 0.006, "Real", cmd);
00228             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    stepSizeArg("", "step_size", "Step size of particles displacement (default 0.5)", false, 0.5, "Real", cmd);
00229             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    angleThreshArg("", "angular_threshold", "Angular threshold between successive displacement vector of a particle's trajectory (default PI/3)", false, M_PI/2., "Real", cmd);
00230             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    seedSpacingArg("", "seed_spacing", "Spacing in mm between seeds (default 1)", false, 1.0, "float", cmd);
00231 
00232             // Parsing arguments
00233             cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00234 
00235             // Get back arguments' values
00236             dwiFileName    = dwiArg.getValue();
00237             maskFileName   = maskArg.getValue();
00238             labelFilename  = labelArg.getValue();
00239             select_labels  = labelsArg.getValue();
00240 
00241             outFibersFileName = outFibersArg.getValue();
00242 
00243             verboseMode  = verboseSwitchArg.getValue();
00244             quietMode    = quietSwitchArg.getValue();
00245             saveTmpFiles = saveTmpSwitchArg.getValue();
00246             lps          = lpsSwitchArg.getValue();
00247 
00248             modelOrder     = orderArg.getValue();
00249             lambda         = lambdArg.getValue();
00250             stepSize       = stepSizeArg.getValue();
00251             angleThreshold = angleThreshArg.getValue();
00252             seedSpacing    = seedSpacingArg.getValue();
00253 
00254 
00255             inRadix     = GetRadixOf(dwiFileName);
00256             vecFileName = inRadix + ".bvec";
00257     }
00258     catch(TCLAP::ArgException &e)
00259     {
00260         std::cout << "TCLAP error: " << e.error() << " for argument " << e.argId() << std::endl;
00261         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00262     }
00263 
00264 
00265     char displayMode = quietMode ? 0 : (verboseMode ? 2 : 1);
00266 
00267 
00268     //
00269     // Diffusion signal extraction
00270     //
00271 
00272         SignalExtractor *extractor = new SignalExtractor(vecFileName, dwiFileName, maskFileName, displayMode);
00273         extractor->extract();
00274 
00275         std::vector<Direction> *directions = extractor->GetDirections();
00276         Sequence::Pointer       signal     = extractor->GetSignal();
00277         std::vector<Real>      *sigmas     = extractor->GetSigmas();
00278         Mask::Pointer           mask       = extractor->GetMask();
00279 
00280         if(saveTmpFiles)
00281             extractor->save();
00282 
00283         delete extractor;
00284 
00285 
00286     //
00287     // Model estimation
00288     //
00289 
00290         SHModelEstimator *estimator = new SHModelEstimator(signal, directions, mask, modelOrder, lambda, displayMode);
00291         estimator->estimate();
00292 
00293         Sequence::Pointer model = estimator->GetModel();
00294 
00295         if(saveTmpFiles)
00296             estimator->save();
00297 
00298         delete estimator;
00299 
00300 
00301 
00302 
00303     //
00304     // Tractography (streamline propagation)
00305     //
00306 
00307 
00308         // Get spherical harmonics model
00309         SHModel *modelFun = new SHModel(model, directions, displayMode);
00310 
00311         // Get signal
00312         Signal *signalFun = new Signal(signal, sigmas, directions, displayMode);
00313 
00314         // Read label image if any and verify sizes
00315         LabelMapReader::Pointer labelReader = LabelMapReader::New();
00316         labelReader->SetFileName(labelFilename);
00317         labelReader->Update();
00318         LabelMap::Pointer labelVolume = labelReader->GetOutput();
00319 
00320 
00321         // Initialize output structures
00322         std::vector<int> labels;
00323         std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData> > fibers;
00324 
00325 
00326         // Resample label map
00327         LabelResampler::Pointer labelResampler = LabelResampler::New();
00328         labelResampler->SetInput(labelVolume);
00329 
00330         LabelInterpolator::Pointer labelInterpolator = LabelInterpolator::New();
00331         labelResampler->SetInterpolator(labelInterpolator);
00332 
00333         LabelMap::SpacingType spacing = labelVolume->GetSpacing();
00334         LabelMap::SizeType size = labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00335         size[0] *= spacing[0]/seedSpacing; size[1] *= spacing[1]/seedSpacing; size[2] *= spacing[2]/seedSpacing;
00336         labelResampler->SetSize(size);
00337 
00338         LabelMap::DirectionType direction = labelVolume->GetDirection();
00339         labelResampler->SetOutputDirection(direction);
00340 
00341         LabelMap::PointType origin = labelVolume->GetOrigin();
00342         labelResampler->SetOutputOrigin(origin);
00343 
00344         spacing[0] = seedSpacing; spacing[1] = seedSpacing; spacing[2] = seedSpacing;
00345         labelResampler->SetOutputSpacing(spacing);
00346 
00347         labelResampler->Update();
00348         LabelMap::Pointer resampledLabelVolume = labelResampler->GetOutput();
00349 
00350         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00351         LabelMapIterator labelIt(resampledLabelVolume, resampledLabelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00352 
00353         unsigned int numOfSeeds = 0;
00354 
00355         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00356         {
00357             if(labelIt.Get() > 0 &&
00358                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00359                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),labelIt.Get()) == labelIt.Get()) )
00360                 numOfSeeds++;
00361         }
00362 
00363         unsigned int numOfSeedsDone = 0;
00364 
00365         std::cout << std::fixed;
00366         std::cout << std::setprecision(2);
00367         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Running tractography..." << std::endl);
00368         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00369         {
00370             int label = (int)labelIt.Get();
00371 
00372             if(label > 0 &&
00373                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00374                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),label) == label) )
00375             {
00376                 LabelMap::IndexType index = labelIt.GetIndex();
00377 
00378                 itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00379                 resampledLabelVolume->TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index, worldPoint);
00380 
00381                 Mask::IndexType maskIndex;
00382                 mask->TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(worldPoint, maskIndex);
00383 
00384                 // If the seed is not in the mask, there is no need to continue this one
00385                 if(mask->GetPixel(maskIndex) != 0)
00386                 {
00387                     Point begin(worldPoint[0], worldPoint[1], worldPoint[2]);
00388 
00389                     // Let's start filtering
00390                     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: " << (Real)numOfSeedsDone / (Real)numOfSeeds * 100 << "%\r" << std::flush);
00391                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's world coordinates: (" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00392                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's image coordinates: (" << maskIndex[0] << "," << maskIndex[1] << "," << maskIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00393 
00394 
00395                     //
00396                     // Streamline propagation
00397                     //
00398 
00399                     // Entrées : modelFun, mask, begin, stepSize, angleThreshold
00400                     // Sortie : fiber (vtkPolyData)
00401 
00402                     // Principe : propagation streamline (suivi direction max de chaque ODF -à chaque point de l'image) en avançant dans la direction d'un pas égal à stepSize
00403                     // Condition d'arrêt : Pas de direction max dans l'angle demandé ou point hors du masque
00404 
00405                     // Algorithme
00406                     // chercher direction max du point courant et sa symétrique
00407                     // pour chaque direction, exécuter les instructions suivantes :
00408                     // initialiser dernière direction à la direction de départ
00409                     // initialiser le point courant à begin + déplacement dans la dernière direction
00410                     // initialiser continuer à vrai
00411                     // tant qu'on peut continuer
00412                     // faire
00413                     // |    si point courant pas dans le masque
00414                     // |    |   alors stop
00415                     // |    |   sinon si recherche direction max dans seuil ne donne rien
00416                     // |    |   |   alors stop
00417                     // |    |   |   sinon propager et mettre à jour point courant et dernière direction
00418                     // |    |   fsi
00419                     // |    fsi
00420                     // ffaire
00421 
00422                     // Variables
00423                     Direction lastDirection;
00424                     Point currentPoint;
00425                     std::vector<Point> part1, part2;
00426                     std::vector<Real> gfa1, gfa2;
00427                     bool goOn;
00428 
00429                     itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00430                     worldPoint[0] = begin.x(); worldPoint[1] = begin.y(); worldPoint[2] = begin.z();
00431 
00432                     itk::ContinuousIndex<Real,3> continuousIndex;
00433                     if(!mask->TransformPhysicalPointToContinuousIndex(worldPoint, continuousIndex))
00434                     {
00435                         std::cout << "Error: continuous index not in image !" << std::endl;
00436                         std::cerr << "(" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ") --> (" << continuousIndex[0] << "," << continuousIndex[1] << "," << continuousIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00437                         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00438                     }
00439 
00440                     Point start(continuousIndex[0], continuousIndex[1], continuousIndex[2]);
00441 
00442                     // Get maximal and symetric directions at start
00443                     Direction maxDirection = modelFun->getMaxDirectionAt(start);
00444                     Direction symDirection(
00445                             M_PI - maxDirection.theta(),
00446                             (maxDirection.phi() < M_PI) ? maxDirection.phi() + M_PI : maxDirection.phi() - M_PI
00447                     );
00448 
00449                     // Treat maximal direction
00450                     lastDirection = maxDirection;
00451                     currentPoint = start + lastDirection.toVector()*stepSize;
00452                     part1.push_back(currentPoint);
00453                     gfa1.push_back(ComputeGFA(modelFun,signalFun,currentPoint));
00454                     goOn = true;
00455 
00456                     while(goOn)
00457                     {
00458                         if(!IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask))
00459                         {
00460                             goOn = false;
00461                         }
00462                         else // IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask)
00463                         {
00464                             Direction mean = MeanDirection(modelFun, currentPoint, lastDirection, angleThreshold);
00465 
00466                             if(mean.isNull())
00467                             {
00468                                 goOn = false;
00469                             }
00470                             else // !mean.isNull()
00471                             {
00472                                 lastDirection = mean;
00473                                 currentPoint = currentPoint + mean.toVector()*stepSize;
00474                                 part1.push_back(currentPoint);
00475                                 gfa1.push_back(ComputeGFA(modelFun,signalFun,currentPoint));
00476                             }
00477                         }
00478                     }
00479 
00480                     // Treat symetric direction
00481                     lastDirection = symDirection;
00482                     currentPoint = start + lastDirection.toVector()*stepSize;
00483                     part2.push_back(currentPoint);
00484                     gfa2.push_back(ComputeGFA(modelFun,signalFun,currentPoint));
00485                     goOn = true;
00486 
00487                     while(goOn)
00488                     {
00489                         if(!IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask))
00490                         {
00491                             goOn = false;
00492                         }
00493                         else // IsInsideMask(currentPoint,mask)
00494                         {
00495                             Direction mean = MeanDirection(modelFun, currentPoint, lastDirection, angleThreshold);
00496 
00497                             if(mean.isNull())
00498                             {
00499                                 goOn = false;
00500                             }
00501                             else // !mean.isNull()
00502                             {
00503                                 lastDirection = mean;
00504                                 currentPoint = currentPoint + mean.toVector()*stepSize;
00505                                 part2.push_back(currentPoint);
00506                                 gfa2.push_back(ComputeGFA(modelFun,signalFun,currentPoint));
00507                             }
00508                         }
00509                     }
00510 
00511 
00512                     //
00513                     // Compute polydata
00514                     //
00515 
00516                     // VTK structures
00517                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> fiber = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
00518 
00519                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>   points = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>::New();
00520                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> lines = vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>::New();
00521                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>   line = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>::New();
00522                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray> gfa = vtkSmartPointer<vtkDoubleArray>::New();
00523 
00524                     // Data
00525                     vtkIdType pid;
00526                     unsigned int id = 0;
00527                     double valueGFA = 0;
00528 
00529                     ImageContinuousIndex ci;
00530                     Image::PointType wp;
00531 
00532 
00533                     // Build fiber with the fiber in world coordinates
00534                     gfa->SetNumberOfComponents(1);
00535                     line->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds(part1.size() + part2.size());
00536 
00537                     // First point
00538                     Point p = part1[part1.size()-1];
00539                     ci[0] = p.x(); ci[1] = p.y(); ci[2] = p.z();
00540                     mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(ci,wp);
00541 
00542                     if(lps)
00543                         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00544                     else // ras
00545                         pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00546 
00547                     valueGFA = gfa1[gfa1.size()-1];
00548                     gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00549                     line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00550 
00551                     // First part
00552                     for(int k=part1.size()-2; k>=0; k--)
00553                     {
00554                         Point p = part1[k];
00555 
00556                         Image::PointType wp;
00557                         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00558 
00559                         cip[0] = p.x(); cip[1] = p.y(); cip[2] = p.z();
00560                         mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp);
00561 
00562                         if(lps)
00563                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00564                         else // ras
00565                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00566 
00567                         valueGFA = gfa1[k];
00568                         gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00569                         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00570                     }
00571 
00572 
00573                     // Last part
00574                     for(unsigned int k=0; k<part2.size(); k++)
00575                     {
00576                         Point p = part2[k];
00577 
00578                         Image::PointType wp;
00579                         ImageContinuousIndex cip;
00580 
00581                         cip[0] = p.x(); cip[1] = p.y(); cip[2] = p.z();
00582                         mask->TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(cip, wp);
00583 
00584                         if(lps)
00585                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(wp[0], wp[1], wp[2]);
00586                         else // ras
00587                             pid = points->InsertNextPoint(-wp[0], -wp[1], wp[2]);
00588 
00589                         valueGFA = gfa2[k];
00590                         gfa->InsertNextTuple(&valueGFA);
00591                         line->GetPointIds()->SetId(id++,pid);
00592                     }
00593 
00594                     lines->InsertNextCell(line);
00595                     fiber->SetPoints(points);
00596                     fiber->SetLines(lines);
00597                     fiber->GetPointData()->SetScalars(gfa);
00598 
00599 
00600                     // Save data
00601 
00602                     for(int l=labels.size(); l<label; l++)
00603                         labels.push_back(-1);
00604 
00605                     if(labels[label-1] == -1)
00606                     {
00607                         fibers.push_back(vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData>::New());
00608                         labels[label-1] = fibers.size()-1;
00609                     }
00610 
00611                     fibers[labels[label-1]]->AddInput(fiber);
00612 
00613                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00614 
00615                     numOfSeedsDone++;
00616                 }
00617             }
00618         } // for each labeled voxels
00619         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: 100.00%" << std::endl << "done." << std::endl);
00620 
00621         delete signalFun;
00622         delete modelFun;
00623         delete directions;
00624         delete sigmas;
00625 
00626 
00627     //
00628     // Writing files
00629     //
00630 
00631         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Writing results..." << std::endl);
00632 
00633         // Write fiber polydata
00634         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tWriting fibers..." << std::flush);
00635         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00636         {
00637             if(labels[label] != -1)
00638             {
00639                 unsigned int nbOfInputs = fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputPorts();
00640                 bool saveFibers = true;
00641                 unsigned int i = 0;
00642 
00643                 do
00644                 {
00645                     if(fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputConnections(i++) < 1)
00646                         saveFibers = false;
00647                 } while(saveFibers && i<nbOfInputs);
00648 
00649                 if(saveFibers)
00650                 {
00651                     std::stringstream filename;
00652                     filename << outFibersFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".vtk";
00653 
00654                     fibers[labels[label]]->Update();
00655                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00656                     writer->SetInput(fibers[labels[label]]->GetOutput());
00657                     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00658                     writer->Write();
00659                 }
00660             }
00661         }
00662         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00663 
00664     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00665 
00666 
00667     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00668 }
